data.title: Meir Zarchi Welcomed Home by Family and Friends
data.meta_description: Crown Heights resident Meir Zarchi was released from the hospital today after recovering from a severe case of coronavirus. He was greeted by jubilant family and friends.
data.text:
Crown Heights resident Meir Zarchi was released from the hospital today after recovering from a severe case of coronavirus. He was greeted by jubilant family and friends.

Crown Heights resident Meir Zarchi was released from the hospital today after recovering from a severe case of coronavirus. He was greeted by jubilant family and friends.

He was greeted outside the hospital by his wife and children who recited the bracha of Shehecheyanu, the Zarchi brother recited Birchas Kohanim.

While he battled the virus, many people davened and said tehillim for his recovery.

Friends and family gathered by his house in Crown Heights to celebrate his return home. There he publically thanked the Hatzalah volunteers for all their help and support during his illness.
